aka: Looking for Lennon – All I want is the truth
ジョン・レノン～音楽で世界を変えた男の真実～
trans_title: Looking for Lennon – All I want is the truth
ジョン・レノン～音楽で世界を変えた男の真実～
introduction: ALL I WANT IS THE TRUTH, JUST GIMME SOME TRUTHAn honest retrospective on the early life of John Lennon, and the tragedies that shaped his personality and later his music. The film includes rare and previously unseen memoirs along with interviews with some of his closest family, friends and associates.
